channel.title: Isolation /levels
channel.description:
Is there anyway I can make areas isolated? for example if you tele to 2121 4918 draynor has been isolated from the map, on its own, I like it, is there anyway that it can be done? heres a pic for the ones who dont have servers.
[IMG]http://i4.photobucket.com/albums/y129/Hoohs/untitled11.jpg[/img]
Second question would be, adding global objects to higher levels, like the second floor, I need them to stay on the second floor, rather than If you log into the bottom floor, they will appear there instead, any ideas?

item.title: Isolation /levels
item.dc:creator: @Mellor Mellor
item.description:
@Mellor wrote:

Ah right, so I doubt that we would be able to do that if we wanted. Thanks.

Still need the isolation details.

Read full topic

item.title: Isolation /levels
item.dc:creator: @Mellor Mellor
item.description:
@Mellor wrote:

What do you mean Jc , when adding global objects I use
makeGlobalObject(2510, 3863, 2783, 0, 10);
for example.
What do I change to 1 instead of 0.

And hdthree, do you think it would be possible to do it?

Read full topic

item.title: Isolation /levels

item.description:
@system wrote:

I’m not sure about draynor but I think what they did was actually create a duplicate of draynor and put it on different cords.
